title: Did the Ministry of Justice propose to restore the rights of defendants during the outbreak of the epidemic?
subtitle: Any changes affecting constitutional guarantees for federal criminal defendants in the United States will ultimately be left to Congress.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: The United States Department of Justice proposed under Trump that federal judges be given broad authority to suspend court proceedings during the national emergency, which would effectively permit indefinite detention of accused persons pending consideration of the state of emergency.
